Sum¶

[3]:

M1 = Stokes('j1')
M1.linear_light(angle=0 * degrees, intensity=1)

M2 = Stokes('j2')
M2.linear_light(angle=0 * degrees, intensity=1)

print(M1)
print(M2)
M3=M1+M2
print(M3)
print(M3.get())

j1 = [ +1;  +1;  +0;  +0]

j2 = [ +1;  +1;  +0;  +0]

j1 + j2 = [ +2;  +2;  +0;  +0]

[25]:

from py_pol.jones_vector import Jones_vector

j1=Jones_vector()
j1.circular_light(kind='r')
print(j1)

M1=Stokes('j1')
M1.from_Jones(j1)
print(M1)

J = [+0.707+0.000j; +0.000+0.707j]'
j1 = [ +1;  +0;  +0;  +1]
